title: Learning C before Sem-2 begins
content: Hey seniors, any tips on where I can effectively learn C ? I've looked online but none of them look worth it.. Also do suggest any textbooks that may help :)

comments.body: I have made notes for everything C in sem2. Let me know if you want the pdfs
A small YouTube playlist will be enough. You don't have too much to learn for sem 2.
I do

Let us c by yashavant kanetkar 

A one stop solution to learning c 

Don't spend time watching crappy videos on yt this book is more than enuf trust me
